text:
Word of the Day: "Weltschmerz" -- lit; “world-pain”; the feeling of sadness at the suffering that surrounds you; the despair produced by the ubiquity of distress & hardship; a weariness at the sheer burden of being. 
(German) 
Sculpture by Laurence Edwards https://t.co/BbIGQIq0w4
